headline.main: SOVIET NAVY HELPS IN ARCTIC SEA FIGHT; Nazi Destroyer Sunk, 3 U-Boats Wrecked, London Reports -- Loss in Convoy Denied SOVIET NAVY HELPS IN ARCTIC SEA FIGHT

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 31 -- The British tonight finally got around to telling their side of the story of what happened to the convoy bound for Russia that the Germans intercepted. It was a different tale from that told by the Germans before the British got around to it.
abstract: Brit version of German attack on USSR-bound convoy; admit 2 ships were damaged; deny merchant ship losses; USSR naval role cited; German claims on Brit losses; Germans rept raid on Murmansk and 3 Brit planes downed over Norway

byline.original: By RAYMOND DANIELLSpecial Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
